sql-case.value: REVOKE SELECT (order_id) ON ds_0.t_order FROM user1
REVOKE INSERT, SELECT, UPDATE, DELETE ON *.* FROM user1
REVOKE ALL PRIVILEGES ON *.* FROM user1
REVOKE ALL PRIVILEGES ON ds_0.* FROM user1
REVOKE ALL PRIVILEGES ON ds_0.t_order FROM user1
REVOKE ALL PRIVILEGES ON FUNCTION ds_0.function1 FROM user1
REVOKE PROXY ON user1 FROM user2
REVOKE PROXY ON user1 FROM user2, user3
REVOKE role1, role2 FROM user1, user2
